      Photo
      In Photos: Battle of the Bands 2015
      February 19, 2015 by Daily Nexus Photography

      On Thursday, Jan. 12, five local bands in the UCSB and Isla Vista area competed in the annual Battle of the Bands. In years past, the winner has earned a spot to perform as the opening act at UCSB’s own Extravaganza. This year, the winning act gets time to record a three-song demo at Rose Lane Studio in Carpenteria. The bands wowed fans with psychedelic sounds and groovy tunes, as Four Closure was deemed victorious.

      Photos by Cameryn Brock, Daily Nexus
